text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires confirmation that the Northern Ireland Protocol declared there would be 'no hard border on the island of Ireland,' phrased as 'no customs or regulatory checks' or 'related physical infrastructure.' The Protocol itself remains the treaty-level instrument...' and later confirms the core principle: 'The Windsor Framework... replacing the earlier arrangements under the original Northern Ireland Protocol (Protocol on Ireland/Northern Ireland, annexed to the Agreement on the United Kingdom from the European Union, signed 24 January 2020...)'
